category-def.name: com.dtsworkshop.flextools.releases.stable
category-def.label: Stable releases
category-def.description: Stable releases of the Flex Tools project. These have been tested (to a certain) extent and the number and frequency of bugs has been deemed it suitable for marking as stable.

category-def.name: com.dtsworkshop.flextools.releases.beta
category-def.label: Beta Releases
category-def.description: These are beta releases (and very possible alpha) releases of the Flex Tools project. Caveat Emptor!
